name: 100 mini-tapestries (on a functional loom!)
blurb: I designed this frame loom to be so easy to use, it's like a sketch pad for weaving! I'll make a weaving on it and send the kit to you!

name: GIRL POWER Textiles!
blurb: We are female. Strong. United. We will win with love. All of our textiles are designed by #nastywomen, meant to empower and inspire!

name: DEKUWOOFF - your thrusting HERO
blurb: DekuWooff!! el mejor de los aliados, un perrito peluche que siempre te animará a cumplir tus metas y nunca rendirte :D

name: Re-open Loop of the Loom – Mindful Zen Weaving Studio in NYC
blurb: Help us save our beloved weaving studio, so we can bring forward a space of peace and self-expression to our community.

name: KAMBA backpack - a socially-empowered project and product
blurb: A platform for elevating artisans’ voices. KAMBA: a contemporary reinvention of the traditional Kiondo basket.

name: Silk Innovation with Tribes in North-East India
blurb: Your pledge will help these traditional weavers to fight climate change and competition from factories through innovation.

name: Meinolf Weaving Center San Anselmo
blurb: A place for weavers and textile lovers to gather, share knowledge and share time. Making things together brings us together.
